content.text:
# Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Musical

| location = United States
| holder = Three Houses by Dave Malloy (2025)
| website =
}}
The Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Musical is an award presented annually at the Lucille Lortel Awards to honor excellence in Off-Broadway musical productions since 1991, when the category was added.
Winners and nominees
